plot_force_directed_graph(node_types, graph_name='Graph')[source]¶

Affiche un graphe force-directed à partir de la matrice d’adjacence de l’instance.

Paramètres : node_types (list of str): Liste des types de nœuds (‘Excitatory’ ou ‘Inhibitory’). graph_name (str) : Le nom du graphe pour le titre de la visualisation.

utils.plot_trajectory(control_points, bezier_points, stance_points)[source]¶

Plots the swing and stance phases of the foot trajectory.

Parameters: control_points (list of tuples): Control points for the Bézier curve. bezier_points (list of tuples): Points on the Bézier curve (swing phase). stance_points (list of tuples): Points on the stance phase trajectory.

utils.plot_trajectory_2(full_trajectory)[source]¶

Plots the full trajectory along with its control points.

Parameters: full_trajectory (list of tuples): Points on the full trajectory.

utils.theta_calf(x, y, z, L=0.213)[source]¶

Calculate the calf angle θ_calf.

Parameters: x (float): The x-coordinate. y (float): The y-coordinate. z (float): The z-coordinate. L (float): The length parameter, default is 0.213.

Returns: float: The calf angle θ_calf in radians.

utils.theta_hip(x, y, z)[source]¶
utils.theta_thigh(x, y, z, L=0.213)[source]¶

Calculate the thigh angle θ_thigh.

Parameters: x (float): The x-coordinate. y (float): The y-coordinate. z (float): The z-coordinate. L (float): The length parameter, default is 0.213.

Returns: float: The thigh angle θ_thigh in radians.
